title: League of Legends Draw! Simultaneous Nexus Destruction
body: If two auto attacks have the same time stamp/frame, is it possible to draw in a base trade?

replies.body:
Considering the maths involved, it would be astronomically hard to do (down to several digits below the decimal point in timing) but if it is done i dunno what would happen, most likely break the system and have a glitched match history/endgame but i now that you mention it, it would be fun to know :P
i doubt there is a 'Draw' endgame screen like the 'Victory' or 'Defeat' but i could be wrong.
i guess its possible considering that they make it a draw when people are in the middle of a match and they turn off the server for working on
